entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 03:22 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: ENE 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
